A first pass square search of SDSS using the conesearch radius as the diameter of the (on sky) square

Author:David Young
Date Created:December 2, 2014
class sloancone.sdss_square_search.sdss_square_search(log, ra, dec, searchRadius, galaxyType=False)[source] ∞

The worker class for the sdss_square_search module

Key Arguments:
log – logger - ra – ra in sexigesimal or decimal degrees - dec – dec in sexigesimal or decimal degrees - searchRadius – search radius in arcsecs

get the results from the the sdss square search
